医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
H5N1 禽流感在美国奶牛中的惊人传播揭示了跨物种传播的危险研究人员发现，H5N1禽流感病毒已蔓延到美国的奶牛中，构成重大的跨物种传播风险。他们的多学科研究揭示了该病毒的进化及其人畜共患的可能性，强调需要加强生物安全措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Alarming-spread-of-H5N1-bird-flu-in-US-dairy-cattle-reveals-cross-species-transmission-dangers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Alarming-spread-of-H5N1-bird-flu-in-US-dairy-cattle-reveals-cross-species-transmission-dangers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f59f736a-61b6-43bf-9482-10ec1bc8d9eb Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:53:00 -0400 Alarming spread of H5N1 bird flu in US dairy cattle reveals cross-species transmission dangers
新冠病毒大流行加速了大脑衰老，尤其是男性和贫困群体COVID-19 大流行加速了大脑衰老，尤其是男性和贫困家庭的大脑衰老，感染者的认知能力显着下降。无论 COVID-19 感染状况如何，都会观察到这种影响，凸显了社会心理压力源的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/COVID-pandemic-accelerated-brain-aging-special-in-males-and-deprived-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/COVID-pandemic-accelerated-brain-aging-special-in-males-and-deprived-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edcbe90a-8d5b-41d7-9018-44daf711e488 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:27:00 -0400 COVID pandemic accelerated brain aging, especially in males and deprived groups
机器学习模型预测多发性硬化症的残疾进展比利时鲁汶大学的 Edward De Brouwer 及其同事本周在开放获取期刊 PLOS Digital Health 上发表的一项新研究表明，机器学习模型可以可靠地告知临床医生多发性硬化症的残疾进展情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Machine-learning-models-predict-disability-progression-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Machine-learning-models-predict-disability-progression-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b8c37c-c628-4a0e-a7ba-32ae8afb0ec2 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Machine learning models predict disability progression in multiple sclerosis
高良姜的治疗特性和植物化学特征宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。近几十年来，人们从植物中发现了多种次生代谢化合物，其中之一是高良姜（Alpinia galanga L.）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Therapeutic-properties-and-and-phytochemical-profile-of-greater-galangal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Therapeutic-properties-and-and-phytochemical-profile-of-greater-galangal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c38f6b1-fc21-409b-9639-59676eb43100 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:07:00 -0400 Therapeutic properties and and phytochemical profile of greater galangal
Rice360 庆祝扩大坦桑尼亚新生儿健康计划今年夏天，莱斯大学校长雷金纳德·德罗什 (Reginald DesRoches) 与 Rice360 全球健康技术研究所联席主任玛丽亚·奥登 (Maria Oden) 和 Rice360 支持者一起前往非洲，这标志着撒哈拉以南地区消除可预防的新生儿死亡道路上的重要里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Rice360-celebrates-expansion-of-newborn-health-program-in-Tanzania.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Rice360-celebrates-expansion-of-newborn-health-program-in-Tanzania.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a92c8437-e4a3-425e-9103-6d252e430c02 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Rice360 celebrates expansion of newborn health program in Tanzania
冬虫夏草可减轻小鼠特发性肺纤维化中国最近的一项研究报道，传统中药用真菌冬虫夏草（CS）可以通过抑制线粒体介导的氧化应激来改善小鼠特发性肺纤维化（IPF）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Cordyceps-sinensis-shown-to-alleviate-idiopathic-pulmonary-fibrosis-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Cordyceps-sinensis-shown-to-alleviate-idiopathic-pulmonary-fibrosis-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=746091e5-1e65-43b0-98e0-c4399bf7a6b6 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:03:00 -0400 Cordyceps sinensis shown to alleviate idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis in mice
研究揭示未定带神经元在早期社会联系和减轻压力中的作用一项针对小鼠的新研究表明，大脑未定带（ZI）中的特定神经元在婴儿与其母亲的早期社交互动中发挥着至关重要的作用，可以建立他们的联系并减轻压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-reveals-role-of-zona-incerta-neurons-in-early-social-bonding-and-stress-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-reveals-role-of-zona-incerta-neurons-in-early-social-bonding-and-stress-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54eed902-0670-4559-852c-1ffdcfd6eaf2 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:59:46 -0400 Study reveals role of zona incerta neurons in early social bonding and stress reduction
医疗补助政策增加了黑人和西班牙裔患者的肿瘤临床试验注册人数威尔康奈尔医学院、宾夕法尼亚大学和 Medidata AI 的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，两项医疗补助政策可以相互作用，以增加黑人和西班牙裔患者的肿瘤临床试验注册人数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Medicaid-policies-boost-oncology-clinical-trial-enrollment-for-Black-and-Hispanic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Medicaid-policies-boost-oncology-clinical-trial-enrollment-for-Black-and-Hispanic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48e842ba-56ea-4d8c-a7a7-56ef0b9b9ad3 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:56:00 -0400 Medicaid policies boost oncology clinical trial enrollment for Black and Hispanic patients
前列腺癌护理中确定的不同患者偏好概况加州大学洛杉矶分校的一组研究人员在被诊断为低风险前列腺癌的男性中确定了基于患者偏好的独特治疗方案，这可能有助于增强前列腺癌护理中的共同决策和患者满意度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Distinct-病人-preference-profiles-identified-in-prostate-cancer-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Distinct-病人-preference-profiles-identified-in-prostate-cancer-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=619a0a79-1933-4356-8756-b97f4a3672e2 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:51:00 -0400 Distinct patient preference profiles identified in prostate cancer care
实验性抗癌药物可能有助于清除大脑中受感染细胞中的艾滋病毒杜兰大学的一项新研究表明，一种最初开发用于治疗癌症的实验药物可能有助于清除大脑中受感染细胞中的艾滋病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Experimental-cancer-drug-may-help-clear-HIV-from-infected-cells-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Experimental-cancer-drug-may-help-clear-HIV-from-infected-cells-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5940c39d-24b1-4e0f-8372-375bb850fb7f Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:47:35 -0400 Experimental cancer drug may help clear HIV from infected cells in the brain
